quotes.quote: Whatever vocation you decide on, track down the best people in the world at doing it and surround yourself with them.
To forgive is the vocation of all Christians.
It is the vocation of the Christian in every generation to out-think all opposition.
Find a vocation and passionately commit your life to it.
It is not more vacation we need - it is more vocation.
Every disability conceals a vocation, if only we can find it, which will 'turn the necessity to glorious gain.
Motherhood is the most challenging as well as the utmost satisfying vocation in this world.
Every man has two vocations: his own and philosophy.
Where your talents and the needs of the world cross; there lies your vocation.
The secret of success is making your vocation your vacation.
Every man has a vocation to be someone: but he must understand clearly that in order to fulfill this vocation he can only be one person: himself.
A dentist at work in his vocation always looks down in the mouth
Many people mistake our work for our vocation. Our vocation is the love of Jesus.
Vocation is different from talent. One can have vocation and not have talent; one can be called and not know how to go.
The pursuit of excellence is the proper vocation of man.
Vocations are born in prayer and from prayer; and only in prayer can they persevere and bear fruit.
See your vocation as a God-given path to holiness.
Research is not a systematic occupation but an intuitive artistic vocation.
A vocation is the backbone of life.
The highest vocation of photography is to explain man to man.
The vocation of every man and woman is to serve other people.
Waiting is the great vocation of the dispossessed.
An unfulfilled vocation drains the color from a man's entire existence.
When something is a vocation, you don't really make a decision about it.
Each of us has our own specific vocation, a sacred journey prepared by the Creator of the universe.
Every man has his own vocation, talent is the call.
The test of a vocation is the love of the drudgery it involves.
No vocation on this side of heaven is as privileged or rewarding as Christian ministry.
Peacemaking is a full-time vocation that includes each member of God's people.
A vocation is born to us all; happily most of us meet promptly our twin, - occupation.
